titleStmt.title: A satyrical poem on the most horrid and execrable Jesuitish Plot in 1678, for the assassination of the King, subversion of the government, destruction of Protestantism and introduction of popery also an humble address to His Most Sacred Majesty for the extirpation of popery / by a loyal subject to the King, a true son of the Church of England and a faithful servant to his countrey, W.M., Esq.
titleStmt.author: W. M., Esq.
